name: Heartbeat Monitor
tagline: visual representation of WordPress' Heartbeat in the admin bar (also sent to console)
body:
### What's it do?
Right now, Heartbeat Monitor does two things:
1. changes color of admin bar to indicate [heartbeat lub/dub](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heart_sounds)
2. sends time of lub/dub to browser's JavaScript console

![](https://github.com/crstauf/Heartbeat-Monitor/raw/master/screenshot.png)

### provided as-is for your usage. be free to fork and change as suits your needs; please, just mention me (give credit) for the original code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
